page.title: 19Interview with Andrew (1/2)
page.content: {"HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED HERE?" 'All my life, which is 21 years,' {"DO THE PLANES AFFECT YOU?" 'Yes I don't like them at all they are very noisy' {"WHAT JOB DO YOU DO?" 'I'm a gardener.' {"DO YOU LIKE YOUR WORK?" 'Yes, it's a very good job. Very interesting.' {"DO YOU DO ANYTHING ELSE?" 'I catch moles and do a bit of fishing now and again.' {"HOW OLD IS YOUR HOUSE?" 'I think it's about 35 years old.' {"WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT LIVING AROUND {HERE?" 'It's very nice, very quiet apart from the planes.' {"WHAT DO YOU DO FOR ENTERTAINMENT?" 'Well normally around this area there is not a great deal.(cont.)
